remarks: Implicit substitution of a class for a setvar variable.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Oct-2016.)
statement:
vtoclgaf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
vtoclgaf.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
vtoclgaf.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
vtoclgaf.4 $e |- ( x e. B -> ph ) $.
vtoclgaf $p |- ( A e. B -> ps ) $.
$d B x $.
